law.history: Repealed 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 99, sec. 3, effective June 18, 1970. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 171, sec. 17, effective June 16, 1960.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Convertibility of permitted investment to a kind not permitted, or receipt of other property with investment does not bar investment.
